product-info.opis: Bogata obnovitvena nočna krema proti gubam Green Line Multiactive, za nego suhe zrele kože po 40. letu. Vsebuje edinstveno kombinacijo arganovega olja in olja m...

ingredient-information.sestavine: AQUA, GLYCERIN, DICAPRYLYL ETHER, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, CYCLOPENTASILOXANE, CYCLOMETHICONE, DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER, POLYGLYCERYL-2, DIPOLYHYDROXYSTEARATE, POLYGLYCERYL-3 DIISOSEARATE, ARGANIA SPINOSA OIL, MACADAMIA TERNIFOLIA SEED OIL, MILK PROTEIN, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, MAGNESIUM STEARATE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, ALUMINIUM STARCH OCTENYLSUCCINATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, METHYLPARABEN, ETHYLPARABEN, BUTYLPARABEN, PROPYLPARABEN, ISOBUTYLPARABEN, MAGNESIUM SULFATE, IMIDAZOLIDINYL UREA, ACETYL HEXAPEPTIDE-8, CERA MICROCRISTALINA, CERA ALBA, BHT, PARFUM.

title: BOGATA NOČNA KREMA PROTI GUBAM, MULTIACTIVE, GREEN LINE, 50 ML
